title: Share of non-performing loans held by banks in the U.S. 1995 to 2019
yAxis: Share of non-performing loans in total loans
summary: Overall Share of non-performing loans in total loans has increased over the Year.
Share of non-performing loans in total loans is roughly constant from '01 to '06, and finally slightly increasing from '06 to '09.
The line drastically increased by 2.2 times from Year '07 to '08, and lastly, increased by 2.1 times from Year '08 to '09.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year '08 and '09.
The highest Share of non-performing loans in total loans, of value 4.7 was reached at Year '09
Minimum Share of non-performing loans in total loans about 0.73 was reached at Year '06
